#summary Remove highlight of EditFind Plugin if set, close editor (Esc) otherwise

 * [Addon Macroses for plugins]

=== Description ===

  When «Persistent Matches» is On in the [http://code.google.com/p/far-plugins/wiki/EdtFind EditFind] plugin, Esc will reset markups (if any exists) or close editor (if no markups).
